title: PE0.6.0官方演示图文直播（原创）
author: 我被盗号了
txt_content:
本帖最后由 我被盗号了 于 2013-1-28 23:12 编辑 

好的，为了方便各位国内MCPE爱好者，本人特开此贴直播本次官方演示直播（PM 11：30 is start )(晚上11:30开始）
大家期待~
请注意下面的回复

replies.txt_content: 赶快来撒~

replies.author: 我被盗号了
replies.txt_content:
首先来看看旁边别人的实时聊天实况（懒得翻译了）
Cowhd: Test
Herpderppotatoe97: you are all disgusting human beings and should reconsider the values of your lives.

replies.author: 我被盗号了
replies.txt_content: 下面回复更新

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: 好像很厉害~
我来看一看

replies.author: 我被盗号了
replies.txt_content: 距离直播6分钟！

replies.author: 我被盗号了
replies.txt_content: 还有4分钟！

replies.author: 买块
replies.txt_content: 去哪里看啊～

replies.author: 买块
replies.txt_content: １分钟了！

replies.author: 我被盗号了
replies.txt_content: 直播开始！！！
